long_description: hi welcome, we're excited that you're here. travelclosely.com, is a small, independent , motivated team and travel enthusiasts specializing in content for rushed and busy travelers, to pack efficiently and safely, we're devoted to making travel fun and simplifying the logistics of travel, especially airlines rules , good planning, traveling tips and gear review. one of the best traits of our small team is that we are all about keeping it real, simple, fun and making sure you get accurate info, services and products. recommendations: we don't recommend a place or a product unless we find it helpful and will help our readers either. knowledge: most of our writers are freelance writers and travelers, who really know what they write about, some of them missed their flights, checked in late and even lost their luggage. alyssa chua is a freelance writer, event planner, and traveler. meet lee, a talented writer and editor who is passionate about traveling and exploring new cultures. alysa is an experienced writer who has adopted the digital nomad lifestyle.
